Sentencas: Performance and economics of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power (SCCHP) system mainly depend on the system's structure, operation strategy and choice of facility capacity.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy

Sentencas: The SCCHP analyzed in this paper, contains a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) that is the power generation unit, a heat recovery system, a photovoltaic (PV) system, solar evacuated tube collectors (ETC), an absorption chiller, an electric chiller and a heat storage tank.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy

Sentencas: An improved operation strategy, termed as best operation condition point (BOCP) strategy, is proposed and applied in this SCCHP system.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy

Sentencas: With the proposed operation strategy, the capacities of the main equipment are optimized based on a particle swarm optimization (PSO) algorithm.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy

Sentencas: In addition, a case study of an apartment building in Guangzhou is conducted to verify the feasibility of the proposed SCCHP system structure and optimal operation strategy.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy

Sentencas: Compared with these separating supply system, the optimized CCHP system has an excellent performance in energy saving.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy

Sentencas: It can save 15141.63 KWh electric energy and increase heat output by 170183.57 MJ per year.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy

Sentencas: Accordingly, the return on investment is 2.55 and the payback period is 11.2 years.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-assisted combined cooling, heating and power system with an improved operation strategy
